tool.name: Mantel
tool.description: Mantel correlation coefficient between two matrices.
tool.command:
echo 'mantel( phylip1=$dist, phylip2=$dist2, method=$method, iters=$iters )' | sed 's/ //g' ## mothur trips over whitespace | mothur &&
## move output files to correct destination prefix="$dist" && mv mothur.*.logfile "$logfile" && mv \${prefix%.dat}*.mantel "$mantel"

param.name: method
param.label: method - pearson, spearman, or kendall. Default: pearson

param.name: iters
param.label: iters - Number of random configuration to try (default 1000)

tool.help:
@MOTHUR_OVERVIEW@
**Command Documenation**
The mantel_ command calculates the Mantel correlation coefficient between two matrices_.
.. _matrices: //www.mothur.org/wiki/Phylip-formatted_distance_matrix .. _mantel: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Mantel
